text: Lorenzo Scattorin (Born in 1971) is an Italian voice actor from Milan, known for his contributes in movies, cartoons, anime and other content. His most known role is Vinsmoke Sanji in One Piece . He is also of the of Maurizio Scattorin, an actor and voice actor. Category:1971 births Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Milan Category:Living people
title: Lorenzo Scattorin
